message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $14,000. It's a great deal considering its value to you.  Let me know what you think!
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to make sure it's worth it for me.

Bob, I understand you're trying to get a good deal, but $11,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I'm still looking for something closer to $13,500. Let's find a middle ground.
I appreciate your willingness to come down, but $13,500 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $12,750. Let's see if we can make a deal.
